committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: Relating to conveyance of certain interests in lands for use by the United States Fish and Wildlife Service.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from acquiring any water resource land or accepting any conservation easement affecting water resource land for the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service unless: (1) the acquisition or granting of the easement is specifically approved by the legislature of the affected State; and (2) the acquisition or easement is subject to express written guarantees of access by the general public to the land concerned at all times.

titles.title: Relating to conveyance of certain interests in lands for use by the United States Fish and Wildlife Service.
